remarks:
Define the union of two classes.  Definition 5.6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 16.  For example, ` ( { 1 , 3 } u. { 1 , 8 } ) = { 1 , 3 , 8 } ` ( ~ ex-un ).  Contrast this operation with difference ` ( A \ B ) ` ( ~ df-dif ) and intersection ` ( A i^i B ) ` ( ~ df-in ).  For an alternate definition in terms of class difference, requiring no dummy variables, see ~ dfun2 .  For union defined in terms of intersection, see ~ dfun3 .  (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-1993.)
